original_text: I saw that the temple had a raised base all around it, forming the foundation of the side rooms. It was the length of the rod, six long cubits.
korean_text: 내가 보니 성전 삼면의 지대 곧 모든 골방 밑 지대의 높이는 한 장대 곧 큰 자로 여섯 척인데

sentences.original_text: I saw that the temple had a raised base
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 성전에 받침대가 있는 것을 보았고

sentences.original_text: forming the foundation of the side rooms
It was the length of the rod
